statements: DELETE FROM spending_reports WHERE user_id = 5 AND report_date = '2022-01-15';

DELETE FROM spending_reports WHERE total_spending > 5000 AND income < 3000;

DELETE FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL;
